00024 #ifndef UVM_RESOURCE_T_H
00025 #define UVM_RESOURCE_T_H
00026 
00027 namespace uvm {
00028 
00029 
00030 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 //
00033 template<typename T>
00034 class uvm_resource :  public uvm_resource_base
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     
00039     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00046     uvm_resource(const std::string& name, const std::string& scope = "*\\.") :
00047         uvm_resource_base(name, scope)
00048     {
00049     }
00050 
00051     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     //
00054     ~uvm_resource() {};
00055 
00056 
00057     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059     //
00060     void set() 
00061     {
00062         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00063         rpool->set(this);
00064     }
00065 
00066     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     //
00069     void set_override()
00070     {
00071         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00072         rpool->set_override(this);
00073     }
00074 
00075     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     //
00078     T read()
00079     {
00080         return m_value;
00081     }
00082 
00083     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085     /*
00086      *  @param value - New value of object. 
00087      */
00088     void write(T value)
00089     {
00090         if (m_read_only)
00091         {
00092             std::cout << "ERROR: uvm_resource_t::write() Resource is read-only" << std::endl;
00093         }
00094         else if (value != m_value)
00095         {
00096             m_value = value;
00097             m_modified_event.notify();
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     /*
00104      *  @return typeid - Typeid of value field
00105      */
00106     const std::type_info & get_value_type_id()
00107     {
00108         return typeid(m_value);    
00109     }
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 protected:
00114 
00115     T m_value;
00116 
00117 };
00118

00120 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 //
00123 template<>
00124 class uvm_resource<sc_bv_base> :  public uvm_resource_base
00125 {
00126 public:
00127 
00128     
00129     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 
00136     uvm_resource(const std::string& name, const std::string& scope = "*\\.") :
00137         uvm_resource_base(name, scope),
00138         m_value(NULL)
00139     {
00140     }
00141 
00142     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     //
00145     ~uvm_resource() 
00146     {
00147         if (m_value) delete m_value;
00148     }
00149 
00150 
00151     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153     //
00154     void set() 
00155     {
00156         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00157         rpool->set(this);
00158     }
00159 
00160     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162     //
00163     void set_override()
00164     {
00165         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00166         rpool->set_override(this);
00167     }
00168 
00169     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00171     //
00172     sc_bv_base read()
00173     {
00174         sc_bv_base bv(m_value->length());
00175         bv = *m_value;
00176         return bv;
00177     }
00178 
00179     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00181     /*
00182      *  @param value - New value of object. 
00183      */
00184     void write(sc_bv_base value)
00185     {
00186         if (m_read_only)
00187         {
00188             std::cout << "ERROR: uvm_resource_t::write() Resource is read-only" << std::endl;
00189         }
00190         else
00191         {
00192             if ( (m_value != NULL) &&
00193                  (m_value->length() != value.length()) )
00194             {
00195                 delete m_value;
00196             }
00197 
00198             if (m_value == NULL)
00199             {
00200                 m_value = new sc_bv_base(value.length());
00201             }
00202 
00203             if (value != *m_value)
00204             {
00205                 *m_value = value;
00206                 m_modified_event.notify();
00207             }
00208         }
00209     }
00210 
00211     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00213     /*
00214      *  @return typeid - Typeid of value field
00215      */
00216     const std::type_info & get_value_type_id()
00217     {
00218         return typeid(sc_bv_base);    
00219     }
00220 
00221     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223     /*
00224      *  @return Number of bits of the resource value
00225      */
00226     int get_nbits()
00227     {
00228         return m_value->length();
00229     }
00230 
00231 
00232 
00233 protected:
00234 
00235     sc_bv_base * m_value;
00236 
00237 };  // uvm_resource_t<sc_bv_base>
00238 
00239 }   // namespace

00241 #endif  // UVM_RESOURCE_T_H
